LanguageData.NBO.Name: Need Bar Overflow
LanguageData.NBO.RestartReq: Restart required for changes to take effect.
LanguageData.NBO.RestartNReq: Changes are applied upon closing settings window.\nGame restart is not necessary.
LanguageData.NBO.DfltEnabled_Tip: Allow most modded pawn needs to overflow, may cause mod incompatibilities but they should be rare.
LanguageData.NBO.DfltOverfPerc_Tip: Default Overflow Percentage for most modded pawn needs.\nDepending on the actual size of the need bar, the higher resulting value of this and the Miscellaneous Overflow Units will apply.
LanguageData.NBO.DfltOverfVal_Tip: Default Overflow Flat Value for most modded pawn needs.\nDepending on the actual size of the need bar, the higher resulting value of this and the Miscellaneous Overflow % will apply.
LanguageData.NBO.FoodOverfEnabled_Tip: Allow pawns' food bars to overflow. This is the point of the mod so you probably want to enable this.
LanguageData.NBO.FoodOverfPerc_Tip: The extra percentage of fullness a pawn can hold\nIf a pawn can normall eat 1.1 units of nutrition, then at 200% they can eat 3.3 units of nutrition.\nDepending on the actual size of the food bar, the higher resulting value of this and the Food Overflow Units will apply.
LanguageData.NBO.FoodOverfVal_Tip: How many additional units of nutrition can a pawn take\nIf a pawn can normally eat 1.1 units of nutrition, then at 2 they can eat 3.1 units of nutrition.\nDepending on the actual size of the food bar, the higher resulting value of this and the Food Overflow % will apply.
LanguageData.NBO.FoodOverflowDisableEating_Tip: If pawn's food level is above {0}, the player cannot order the pawn to consume any more food with nutrition, the pawn can still use drugs of 0 nutrition, or consume food in a food binge.
LanguageData.NBO.RestOverfPerc_Tip: Overflow percentage specifically for rest need\nIf set to 100% the rest level can reach 200%
LanguageData.NBO.JoyOverfPerc_Tip: Overflow percentage specifically for recreation need\nIf set to 100% the recreation level can reach 200%
LanguageData.NBO.BeautyOverfPerc_Tip: Overflow percentage specifically for beauty need\nIf set to 100% the beauty level can reach 200%
LanguageData.NBO.ComfortOverfPerc_Tip: Overflow percentage specifically for comfort need\nIf set to 100% the comfort level can reach 200%
LanguageData.NBO.ChemicalOverfPerc_Tip: Overflow percentage specifically for chemical need\nIf set to 100% the chemical level can reach 200%
LanguageData.NBO.MoodOverfPerc_Tip: Overflow percentage specifically for mood level\nIf set to 100% the mood level can reach 200%
